item.description: The friendliest after work mixer in the city returns with a twist. We’re putting a twitterific spin on our quarterly Professionals of Color Mixer. This Cocktails & Connections Tweetup is for those working (and playing) in the online and technology arena: Bloggers, Designers, Developers, Entrepreneurs, Community Organizers and those involved in Digital Media, Marketing, Advertising. This is your unique to chance to connect with an eclectic, innovative group of professionals at the forefront of What’s Next. Not sure what a Tweetup is? Let our friends at BostonTweetUp break it down: http://bostontweetup.... (You do not have to be on Twitter to attend this event. Is it open to all).
item.name: Cocktails & Connections: #ConnectUp
